resources.string: First Aid And Disaster Management App

Epilepsy is a brain condition that causes a person to have seizures. It is one of the most common disorders of the nervous system.\n There are different types of seizures. The type of seizure depends on which part and how much of the brain is affected and what happens during the seizure. The 2 main categories of epileptic seizures are focal (partial) seizure and generalized seizure.

A seizure can be caused by many things. These can include:
 1.An imbalance of nerve-signaling brain chemicals (neurotransmitters)
 2.Brain tumor
 3.Stroke
 4.Brain damage from illness or injury
 Epilepsy may be caused by a combination of these. In most cases, the cause of epilepsy canâ€™t be found.
